Module net.etf.project
Package net.etf.project.gui

Class MainApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
net.etf.project.gui.MainApplication
public class MainApplication extends javafx.application.Application
The MainApplication class is the main entry point of the application. It initializes the app by loading configuration properties, loading vehicles, rentals, and running the rental simulation, as well as generating summary and daily reports.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      Starts the JavaFX application, loads the configuration properties, initializes the simulation, and sets up the GUI.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary stage for the application
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the FXML file

      the primary Stage instance

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point for launching the application.
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments

    • simulateRentals

      public static void simulateRentals(MapController mapController)
      Simulates vehicle rentals by running each rental in its own thread. Rentals are simulated in chronological order, with a 5-second pause between different rental periods.

    • clearFolder

      public static void clearFolder(String folderPath)
      Deletes all files in the specified folder.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - The absolute path to the folder whose contents will be deleted.
